title: Adarushan no Hanayome - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Aristocracy   Arranged Marriage   Female Protagonist   Loli
author: Amekawa Kei
description: The small country of Adarshan recently conquered a territory of the Castoria Empire. To create an alliance between the two countries and secure new border alignments, the victorious Adarshan general, Alexid Deke Adars (the king's younger stepbrother), was forced into a political marriage with Castoria's sixth imperial princess Justinia. But she's only 10 years old!>
